vulnerability_details.description: Non-constant-time string comparison allows attackers to deduce API key through timing analysis
vulnerability_details.attack_vector: Statistical timing analysis of authentication responses

fix_applied.implementation: Replaced string comparison with buffer-based timing-safe comparison
security_benefits: Prevents progressive API key reconstruction attacks
Maintains constant execution time regardless of comparison position

result.security_improvement: Eliminated timing side-channel attack vector in API key authentication
recommendations: Monitor authentication logs for suspicious patterns
Consider implementing periodic API key rotation
Ensure API keys are cryptographically random
